message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as a teacher from the United Arab Emirates. I need to provide responses to 10 statements about AI. Let me think about each one carefully:

[TT4G35A]: Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.
- This is true - AI can help with generating ideas, structuring content, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.
- This is true - AI can personalize content and adapt to different levels. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.
- This is true - AI can provide individual support, tutoring, feedback, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).
- This is true - AI can help with translations, adaptive learning, text-to-speech, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.
- This is true - AI can help with grading, attendance, scheduling, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35F]: Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.
- This is true - AI can be used to generate text that students could present as their own. I would say "Agree" as this is a concern/risk

[TT4G35G]: Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.
- This is true - AI can make errors and provide incorrect recommendations. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.
- This is a known concern about AI - it can have biases in training data. I would say "Agree"


[TT4G35I]: Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.
- This is a valid concern about AI systems and data handling. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.
- This is a concern about AI not understanding educational best practices. I would say "Agree"

As a teacher, I'm balancing recognition of AI's genuine benefits in lesson planning, personalization, and administrative efficiency with legitimate concerns about academic integrity, data security, and potential biases. The risks around privacy, inappropriate recommendations, and pedagogical misalignment are real considerations I need to account for when implementing these tools in my classroom.

reasoningText.text:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as a teacher from the United Arab Emirates. I need to provide responses to 10 statements about AI. Let me think about each one carefully:

[TT4G35A]: Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.
- This is true - AI can help with generating ideas, structuring content, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.
- This is true - AI can personalize content and adapt to different levels. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.
- This is true - AI can provide individual support, tutoring, feedback, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).
- This is true - AI can help with translations, adaptive learning, text-to-speech, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.
- This is true - AI can help with grading, attendance, scheduling, etc. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35F]: Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.
- This is true - AI can be used to generate text that students could present as their own. I would say "Agree" as this is a concern/risk

[TT4G35G]: Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.
